list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the part of a plant which attaches it to the ground or to a support, typically underground, conveying water and nourishment to the rest of the plant via numerous branches and fibers.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cacti have deep and spreading roots
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cacti có rễ sâu và lan rộng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the basic cause, source, or origin of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: love of money is the root of all evil
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tình yêu tiền là gốc rễ của mọi tội lỗi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a number or quantity that when multiplied by itself, typically a specified number of times, gives a specified number or quantity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: find the cube root of the result
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tìm rễ khối của kết quả

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a user account with full and unrestricted access to a system.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I have a root through the open drawers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi có một gốc thông qua các ngăn kéo mở

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause (a plant or cutting) to grow roots.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: root your own cuttings from stock plants
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: root giâm cành của riêng bạn từ thực vật chứng khoán

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: vegetarianism is rooted in Indian culture
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ăn chay bắt nguồn từ văn hóa Ấn Độ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause (someone) to stand immobile through fear or amazement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: George was rooted to the spot in disbelief
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: George đã rễ vào vị trí trong sự hoài nghi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: gain access to the root account of (a smartphone or computer).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we explained how to manually root almost any Android device
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã giải thích cách thực hiện root thủ công hầu hết mọi thiết bị Android

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an animal) turn up the ground with its snout in search of food.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: stray dogs rooting around for bones and scraps
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những con chó đi lạc rễ xung quanh cho xương và phế liệu
